text: Patrik Lamper (born 10 March 1993) is a Slovak professional ice hockey forward who currently plays for HC Slovan Bratislava in the Kontinental Hockey League (KHL). He was selected and competed for Slovakia in the 2018 Winter Olympics. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:HC '05 Banská Bystrica players Category:Ice hockey players at the 2018 Winter Olympics Category:Slovak ice hockey forwards Category:Olympic ice hockey players of Slovakia Category:HC Slovan Bratislava players Category:Sportspeople from Banská Bystrica
title: Patrik Lamper
